swp_compiler_ss13.common.ast.nodes.marynary

Interface BlockNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ASTNode, StatementNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockNodeImpl

    public interface BlockNode
extends StatementNode
    The node to represent a block. A block consists of n declarations followed by m statements. m, n >= 0.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert"

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface swp_compiler_ss13.common.ast.ASTNode

        ASTNode.ASTNodeType
